macro_markets.query: What are the most important macroeconomic and stock market news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include major index movements, Fed/central bank news, and significant company earnings or announcements.

items.title: S&P 500 and Dow Close at Record Highs on December 24
items.summary: The S&P 500 rose 0.3-0.4% to 6,932 points, while the Dow Jones gained 0.6-0.7% to 48,731, both hitting record highs in a shortened session amid holiday optimism and resilient economic backdrop.

items.title: Nasdaq Composite Advances 0.3% in Wednesday's Shortened Trading
items.summary: The Nasdaq rose 51 points or about 0.3% on December 24, contributing to broad market gains driven by expectations of strong earnings and economic resilience.

items.title: US Stock Futures Edge Higher in Thin Post-Christmas Trade
items.summary: S&P 500 futures up 0.1% to 6,987, Nasdaq 100 futures up 0.1% to 25,908, and Dow futures up 0.1% to 49,057 amid low holiday volumes and anticipation of year-end rally.

items.title: S&P 500 Inches Up 0.13% to 6,941 in Early Friday Trading
items.summary: The US500 index rose slightly to 6,941 points on December 26, gaining 0.13% from the prior session, continuing momentum from record highs.

items.title: Markets Extend Santa Rally on Strong Q3 GDP Growth Outlook
items.summary: US indices advanced on reports of 4.3% annualized GDP growth, the fastest in two years, boosting sentiment for tech/AI stocks and potential 2026 Fed rate cuts.

crypto_news.query: What are the most significant cryptocurrency and blockchain news from the past 24 hours? Include major price movements, regulatory news, and notable project developments.

items.title: Bitcoin Options Worth $23.7B Expire Today, Traders Expect Volatility
items.summary: A record $23.7 billion in Bitcoin options expires on December 26, potentially causing a 5-7% price swing as BTC trades in the $85k-$92k range. Analysts predict a possible dip to $82k-$84k followed by a rally to $95k amid thin holiday liquidity and tax-loss harvesting.[1]

items.title: Bitcoin Rebounds Near $90,000 Amid Ongoing Volatility
items.summary: Bitcoin has recovered to near $90,000 levels after trading in a tight range, with persistent volatility expected due to upcoming options expiry and year-end factors.[5][1]

items.title: BlackRock's 2026 Outlook: Crypto as Core Infrastructure, Stablecoins Go Mainstream
items.summary: BlackRock views crypto as essential infrastructure, highlighting stablecoins' role in payments and settlement, bolstered by U.S. GENIUS Act regulation and Circle's 2025 IPO success.[2]

items.title: Michael Saylor Discusses Bitcoin Crash and MSTR Stock Drop
items.summary: Michael Saylor analyzes the recent Bitcoin price crash and MicroStrategy stock decline, advocating corporate Bitcoin adoption as a treasury asset amid market volatility.[3]

ai_news.query: What are the most important artificial intelligence and machine learning news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include new model releases, company announcements, research breakthroughs, and industry trends.

items.title: Loomi Launches as World's First AI Influence Agent
items.summary: Loomi, introduced on December 26, 2025, redefines content creation using IDE thinking and agent technology, embedding expert experiences for scenario adaptation, competitor analysis, and historical data mining to boost viral content efficiency.

items.title: Journal Introduces Generative AI Declaration for Manuscript Submissions
items.summary: On December 26, 2025, a new policy requires declarations for generative AI use in submissions, defining it as AI systems like LLMs and GANs that produce original content resembling human work.

items.title: Bruce Boyes Presents Two Scenarios for AI in Knowledge Management at KM Trends 2026
items.summary: Bruce Boyes delivered a presentation on December 26, 2025, outlining two contrasting future scenarios for AI integration in knowledge management.

gaming.query: What are the most notable video game and gaming industry news from the past 24 hours? Include game releases, announcements, esports, and industry developments.

items.title: Epic Games Store Announces December 2025 Free Games Including Universe for Sale
items.summary: Epic Games Store has revealed its December 2025 freebies, starting with Universe for Sale available from December 25-26, with more titles to be added throughout the month to wrap up the year.

tech_news.query: What are the most important technology news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include major product launches, company news, and significant tech industry developments. Exclude AI-specific news.
